templates.name: Initial Property Inquiry
templates.subject: Interested in your property at {{property_address}}
templates.content:
Hello {{contact_name}},

I hope this email finds you well. My name is {{sender_name}} with {{company_name}}, and I'm reaching out because we're interested in acquiring properties in the {{property_city}} area.

I noticed your property at {{property_address}} and wondered if you've considered selling? We're offering competitive cash offers with flexible closing timelines.

Some benefits of working with us:

  • No fees or commissions
  • As-is purchase (no repairs needed)
  • Flexible closing timeline
  • Cash offer

If you're interested in exploring this opportunity, please reply to this email or call me directly at {{sender_phone}}.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best regards,

{{sender_name}}
{{sender_title}}
{{company_name}}
{{sender_phone}}
{{sender_email}}

templates.name: FSBO Follow-up
templates.subject: Following up about your property listing
templates.content:
Hi {{contact_name}},

I noticed your property at {{property_address}} has been listed for sale by owner for {{days_on_market}} days. I wanted to follow up and see if you're still looking for a buyer?

If you're encountering challenges with the traditional selling process, we offer a hassle-free alternative that might be worth considering. Our team at {{company_name}} specializes in providing fair cash offers with no contingencies or financing delays.

Here's what sets us apart:

  • Closing in as little as 7 days
  • No showings or open houses required
  • No need for repairs or staging
  • No realtor commissions or hidden fees

Would you be open to a brief conversation about your property and how we might be able to help? I'm available this week for a call at your convenience.

Best regards,

{{sender_name}}
{{sender_title}}
{{company_name}}
{{sender_phone}}
{{sender_email}}

P.S. If you've already found a buyer, congratulations! Feel free to disregard this email.

templates.name: Expired Listing Outreach
templates.subject: Alternative solution for your property at {{property_address}}
templates.content:
Hello {{contact_name}},

I noticed that your listing for {{property_address}} recently expired after {{days_on_market}} days on the market. I understand how frustrating it can be when a property doesn't sell as expected.

My name is {{sender_name}} with {{company_name}}. We specialize in providing solutions for property owners who may be looking for alternatives to the traditional real estate listing process.

We offer:

  • A fair cash offer based on current market values
  • Quick closing - often in under 3 weeks
  • No additional marketing or showing required
  • No repairs needed - we buy properties in any condition

If you're still interested in selling your property, I'd be happy to discuss how we might be able to help. Our process is straightforward and designed to save you time and stress.

Would you be available for a brief call this week to discuss potential options?

Warm regards,

{{sender_name}}
{{sender_title}}
{{company_name}}
{{sender_phone}}
{{sender_email}}

templates.name: Distressed Property Outreach
templates.subject: We can help with your property at {{property_address}}
templates.content:
Hello {{contact_name}},

I hope this message finds you well. My name is {{sender_name}} with {{company_name}}.

We specialize in providing solutions for property owners who may be facing challenging situations such as:

  • Properties needing significant repairs
  • Behind on mortgage payments
  • Inherited properties
  • Tired landlord situations
  • Tax liens or other financial concerns

I'm reaching out specifically about your property at {{property_address}}. If any of these situations sound familiar, we may be able to help by offering:

  • A fair cash offer
  • Quick closing timeline
  • Purchase in as-is condition (no repairs needed)
  • No fees or commissions
  • Potential solutions for outstanding liens or payments

Every situation is unique, and we pride ourselves on creating customized solutions that work for property owners. If you're interested in exploring options, I'd be happy to schedule a confidential, no-obligation conversation.

Best regards,

{{sender_name}}
{{sender_title}}
{{company_name}}
{{sender_phone}}
{{sender_email}}

templates.name: Follow-up After No Response
templates.subject: Following up: Your property at {{property_address}}
templates.content:
Hello again {{contact_name}},

I reached out last week about your property at {{property_address}} and wanted to follow up in case my previous message was missed.

We're still interested in discussing the possibility of purchasing your property, and I'd be happy to provide you with a no-obligation cash offer.

If you're interested, here's how our simple process works:

  1. Brief phone conversation to understand your needs
  2. Free property evaluation (no inspection required)
  3. We present a fair cash offer
  4. If you accept, we handle all paperwork and closing
  5. You receive cash for your property in as little as 7-14 days

If the timing isn't right or you've already made other arrangements, no problem at all. You can simply reply to let me know, and I won't follow up further.

However, if you're curious about what we might offer for your property, I'm available for a quick call or to answer any questions via email.

Best regards,

{{sender_name}}
{{sender_title}}
{{company_name}}
{{sender_phone}}
{{sender_email}}
